content: Overall, GEOs sold were relatively flat when compared to prior year with third quarter GEOs sold being 176,408 compared to 177,578 in third quarter 2021, of which precious metal GEOs were 120,542, down 7,150 GEOs from prior year. Offsetting the lower GEOs sold from the assets mentioned, we had strong third quarter performance from Candelaria and Tasiast compared to prior year. On Slide 9, we reiterate our guidance for the year based upon commodity -- updated commodity prices as highlighted on the slide and our expectations of production from our royalty and stream interest for fourth quarter, we are forecasting that weâll be at the high end of the total GEOs sold guidance of 680,000 to 740,000.
